title: Web Developer
description:
Insurance brokerage company connecting individuals and large transportation companies with insurance providers, offering customized quotes.
Developed and maintained web applications and website components using Node.js, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and PostgreSQL within an MVC architecture.
Used Git for version control to ensure code quality and smooth collaboration, participated in testing and feature deployment, and collaborated remotely to enhance user experience and application performance.

title: IT Support & Helpdesk
description:
Software company providing digital solutions like CRM systems for small markets and dental clinics.
Supported clients through Jira, managed tickets, and handled database tasks including data entry, validation, and basic analysis. Assisted with system and application setup.
Gained strong communication, organization, and problem-solving skills in a hybrid (remote and on-site) environment.
